values:
So I decided that I am going to start using this thing again.

Although I will be going back to something I started a long time ago after being inspired by Billy Corgans "Personal Confessions" which were short stories from his life which he posted on his website in 2005.

 I will start this out now by going back and reposting the stories that I posted a couple of years ago before giving up, then I will write more as I see fit.

Sluts ruin the day. Keep your legs closed lady, your gonna get a fucking disease!!!


 So Dave and I went to Karens funeral on Friday morning, an event which I have been trying to not even think about. It was pretty tough to walk into that room knowing I hadnt spoken to Mike in years and watch him cry as a preacher preached bullshit about things that dont even matter as his moms dead body sits motionless for all to see...



Last night Leigh Ann picked me up at like 12:40 and we went out to overlook to gawk at how retarded Dow Diamond is. I relate to Leigh Ann pretty well and Im glad that she is my friend. Its pretty easy to speak to her about things because unlike most people I know she actually has human feelings. 

" I want to go to outer space and ta ta da da sing a song to my lord, I want to go to outer space and ta ta da da sing a song to my children, I want my children to go to the lord and ta ta da da sing a song to outer space"

So the last couple days brought lots of joy with them. 420 was a blast and today brought the news of another trip to Canada next week. 

 I spoke with Davey today about the remaining 4000 dollars in funds that need to be seriously discussed here before the record can be mastered. Its kind of depressing because I know that we as individuals dont have the money. It can be easily obtained but I think more than anything we wanted to make this record on our own and just have someone distribute it and help us with touring. It looks like buisness talk is in our near future...something that has been worrying all of us for a long time because of the fact that it is either the ultimate step for our band or the complete end. Its when everyone has to sit down at a table and say "yes I will do this for at least the next 4 years of my life without any doubt in my mind" and if not all of us can say that, then thats it....
The perfect place this time of the year.

Today is a beautiful day and it just got better after smoking a blunt with my boy d sep. 

Hoping to get my hands on some more fungus....The 420 party starts in a little less than 6 hours....

A true friend
Is a friend
That no matter gender
Will hold you when you cry


And last night
I swear she looked
Right back into my eyes

It felt good to make some kind of contact

Its kind of nice not having to have a job and having my own place and just being able to play guitar and eat mushrooms all day.

 I could get used to this.

Homesick suicide sonata
words By:  J. Miller

 And the good ole river
 Still flows

 And the Angels they grow
 As old

 As the earth underneath
 My Feet

 Freedom has never felt
 So sweet

 And the soldiers
 Are killing babies

 And the soldiers
 Are Killing babies

 And the familiar wind
 Still blows

 And the Angels they
 All know

 That the earth underneath
 My feet

 Is the birth of
 Everything sweet

 Hold on to those you Love

So as expected the trip to Toronto was amazing. We met up and did some drinking at jonnys right down the street from the opera house and then it was showtime. Do Make dominated as usual and it was nice to chat with those fellas (as well as the beautiful woman who makes love to the violin) once again. We drove straight to Toronto and then did some buzzed driving straight back to the US.

 This trip made me realize how important it is that myself as well as the rest of my band get out of this country as soon as possible. There is alot of talk going around that kind of upsets me...

 When im at work and a girl I havent seen in like 9 months walks up to me and starts talking to me like she is one of my best friends talking about how she heard "my band was getting signed" and that we were selling our music to movies etc..... that upsets me. Not that Im not proud of my band or the things we are starting to accomplish...it just upsets me that we told certain people about these events and asked them to keep quiet and they couldnt handle it.

 We have been catching alot of shit lately with people saying we have grown to big for our britches. Fuck that if we couldnt handle what we have taken on then we wouldnt have done it. For all anyone knows...we could already be signed and just not be telling anyone....but the truth is.....We arent ready to make the decision about putting this record out yet. 

 and with sadness i must now admit to myself that it is obvious this record will not see the light of day until early next year. there are many decisions that we all need to make as far as the band and our personal lifes go.
also, all the labels we have talked to say they want at least 6 months of promotion/in store touring before putting the full length out.


 hassle hassle hassle

So after a long battle against bullshit the detachment kit is up and running again and it looks like they are comming to play a show with us at the elbow room in ypsi on the 10th of october we are just waiting for the final word fro mthe venue before we announce and start promoting the show. woot woot woot. once its confirmed I will post all the info on our site.

 im so excited im going to shit.

Oh my fucking god

 I ended up going in super early and working 12 hours today.


 I missed band practice and I have class all day tom.

oh my fucking god.

So I got back home at like 4:30 in the morning and Chad came to town with me. So right away we starting mapping out and making storyboards for the video project because our work time as a group is very limited.  The ideas are really flowing and I think its going to turn out great.

im super tired though becuase I havent slept in 2 days so im goin to go do that.

Broken Hearts want broken necks
I've done some things that I would live to forget
But I cant


 So with me comming back home to Interlochen Yesterday we Finished the Album. Its done. Almost, actually not even close. The core of every song is now done and sounds fucking chronic. Now we have to start the bass work which will consist of 2 weeks and John Torkelson and myself sitting in the studio and tracking bass on every song until we are happy with it. Then come the string parts: cello and viola on Sharing Milk and which witch is which, cello on day of the dogs and upright bass and cello on trucker showers.

 Im going to go enjoy some dinner with jakes family at the hofbrau now...suckas.

Besides having an emotional breakdown on account of my financial aid problems last nights party was a fucking blast...

 tonight at the naked warriors will be even better once we get this shit hole show out of the way.


 It feels really good to know that after tonight we wont have to worry about shows at all until December. A much needed vacation from the stress of a different city every night and not getting paid dick.

 Nothing but time to write and record this is what this band needs if its going to stay alive.

I got bored while jake was tracking guitar today so I watched "Walk the Line" which was actually an incredible movie. The acting was decent and the story was very very strong and very well written. Johnny cahs lived a fucked up life.

 We are getting ready for the whole Midland crew to meet us here. D Sep, Jackson, Mark, Naked Warrior, Sam, Krysta, Nicci and her boyfriend Nick. Then head to Marquette for the show sat.

 We made our first new friend in the area the other day. His name is chris and he works at the clark station, which funny enough is how we met him. Jake walked in there in has legalize it shirt and thats all it took.

 Also, I got my new job, which is a plus i suppose.
I met Malcom Mcdowell (A clockwork orange) and Micheal Moore last night at the clockwork orange 10 pm screening. what an awesome fucking night.
Being happy is alot more stressful then being depressed. Being depressed is easy.

So I completely changed this entry in my "personal" journal because I wrote some pretty out there vulgar shit while drunk the other night.

this entry is now gone and I will carry on with my life and continue to write in this bullshit "personal" journal as i see fit to help me deal with all this bullshit. I dont know just writting about the things that are happening to me makes it easier to deal with, good or bad, it helps this shit from overwhelming me.

The only type of solution is a permanent one.

 If the solution isnt forever, you havent solved anything.

Every stupid thing you say
Speaks volumes about who you are...

So coffee crave was a fucking zoo.

 The crowd was totally not who we expected. Midland is no longer our town. Our friends no longer live here thus there is really no reason to come back and play awkward shows to the stuck up kids of this town that dont understand the concept of music.

 Our set went fairly well and we played in our usual very very loud manner. The new one was really shaky at first but by the end i couldnt resist almost having a seizure I was having so much fun playing it. Then there were a couple of extra special songs after that one (which was suppose to be our last). 

 All in all I hate this town, Im still here. I want to go home and I for sure dont want to come back here to play again on aug 15th.


ughhh

We will be back in Michigan tomorrow night at the Elbow Room in Ypsilanti with The Shapes from New York City, If you have ever seen the show "Dallas swat" then you know their music, they did the theme song and they have became good friends of ours over the past couple months.

 So all in all big ups to the NYC crew : The DK and The shapes.

The move to Interlochen has gone very smoothly.


 Tomorrow we prep for tour and leave in the wee hours of the morning wed.

 I will see you all in a few weeks.

 I will obviously be tired, a bit skinnier and full of gross facial hair.

So tomorrow will pretty much be my last day of living in midland. We leave for the marquette shows with colieda tomorrow and then we go straight to florida.

 Come home on the 26th finish up the rough tracks for the full length June 28th - July 6th (with the 1st off for jakes graduation party and the 4th off to get drunk). Then we have two shows in this area that week as well as moving the rest of our shit to Interlochen Then on July 12th we head out for tour returning around the 26th.

 Then a month of fun jamming and taking it easy o nthe water until school starts Aug. 26th.


 Good riddance to the garbage of Midland. And farewell to all the people who Iam happy I will never see again.

So the songs for this record are starting to take shape. we are having a hard time deciding what to do for the show this saturday since we arent even suppose to be doing any shows right now. I havent had time for anthing at all besides work and glnis, at least glynis will pay off someday.

 My mom is back in the hospital and its not really  certain if she will make it home or not this time. 

 Who are we to complain
 when god takes life away

There is no time for anything anymore. WORK PRACTICE WORK PRACTICE SLEEP WORK PRACTICE.

 IM GONE IN LESS THAN 1 MONTH.  WE ARE MOVING SOONEER THAN THOUGHT AND I COULDNT BE HAPPIER.

There are things in life that are so beautiful they cant be explained in words

 And so ugly they should never be seen

 So pleasing but never heard

 Its Like every 1 minute I spend in this town

 Takes 5 minutes off the end of my life

 

 Im so content it makes me sick. I dont care about anything anymore. Which in some ways is great but is also very troublesome because Im always either content or completely In pieces. It sucks to roll over in the morning and realize that the one reason you are waking up is also the one reason you wish you would never wake up again.


 We worked on a couple new songs tonight. The main one we are trying to finish right now is called "Sorry Mr Newton". We finished two songs last week, "Looking closely at Plants" and "Arms around Horses".

 We will be debuting most if not all of our new stuff at The deadwait finale show on May 27th.

 We discussed the new disc the other night. The plan was to put it out mid-summer but we arent so sure now. We really enjoy working with Rick and we think it would be in our best interest to record the whole disc with him which is going to take alot more time then we had budgeted to record this disc.

 So in final, The decision was made that we will not be putting out another EP at all anytime soon. Instead our goal is to move to interlochen as planned but continue to come to town and work with Rick on finishing this cd, Which will sometime next year become our full length debut. Which we are shopping around right now because we dont think frenchkiss is the best option.

Im so tired.

Pretty pictures on my wall
this is all nothing.
whites bar is the stupidest place on earth.

So last night was pretty fucked up.

 I got in my car at like 11:30 and drove to where I used to live on waldo court and parked down at the end of the court and walked around out there most of the night. It was really nostalgic but also upset me in alot of ways because I feel that emotionally I still havent left that place. I ended up getting in my car at about 4:30 AM and just crying for about 15 minutes straight and punching my steering wheel.   


 Life is still sweet.

 Everything results in growth.


 Tonight after i work my 2nd shift of the day im going to Whites with Jonny for some good ole rock and roll.

 Peace be with anyone who reads this, someone somewhere loves you and thats all that matters.

We did some really good work in my opinion at big bear yesterday but my attitude towards this band is still uncertain. I dont know if I want to be in Glynis anymore. I mean it is my passion and everything but its also alot of added stress that I dont need right now. Also, I sunk over 100 dollars into the recording of just one song yesterday...this shit is too much for me to handle.


 Also, my bandmates told me we would practicing before I had to work today and that they would call me 1st thing in the morning, so I was like "alright, sweet." and the one day i nthe last 3 months that I could have slept pass 9, I woke up and here it is 2:08 in the afternoon and still no word from them, I have called both of them and been told that they arent home and they dont answer their cell phones.

 This is exactly the shit that makes me not want to be in this band.

So tonight was a heaping steaming pile of dogshit. I worked for all of 2 hours this evening and didnt really accomplish dick other than that. We practiced from like 1:30-4:00 today which was really nice and much needed to prepare for saturday at big bear. I have started to notice that the more I write in this this about my personal feelings and events in my everyday life, those events and feelings become less and less overwhelming every time.

 So its Friday now which obviously means nothing to me, just like every other day. Tippy was sentenced to 14 months rehab yesterday and Im glad. He needs the help and the 14 months rehab is a hell of alot better than the 8 years prison he was facing. Mark agreed to drop all the charges if he stays at rehab the whole 14 months.

 Travis has been scaring me more and more lately. All of these things have really made me hate drugs. Travis is a great guy with alot to offer the world. A kind soul and a warm heart and it hurts me that he is slowly killing himself just to take the edge off of everyday life. DEAL WITH YOUR LIFE DUDE. ITS REAL. HEROIN ISNT REAL.


 Just the thought of heroin makes me sick. The one time I saw it in person I almost threw up, honestly. Its something I could never do to myself and as much as it saddened me I told Travis that if he doesnt start to try or get some kind of help soon that Im going tyo tell Mark he has been comming to work high because a majority of the time I could be held responsible for any major issues that  would arise from his foolishness.

 Im tired and I have to do dough again tomorrow. I would also like to thank mark for waiting to call me until 11:00 tonight to tell me he wants me in at 7.  Thanks.

I wish only the best for every person on this earth. If we could all learn that everyone is human and that our differences are only cultural and mean nothing then it would be a much better place to live.

 I demanded a raise from Mark today and he said yes without much hassle. I just simply pointed out to him that Corey and I both do the work of 4 people every morning on our own and without us he would be up shit creek without a paddle. So my phat cash has become even phatter.

I have to be to work in less than 6 hours and no matter how hard I try I cant sleep. Tonight was such an awkward night and today was such a shitfest. I spent probably about 20 minutes max with Bethany tonight and those few minutes made my entire day worth existing.

 I seriously dont know what to do with myself. I have tried so hard to do things that make me a better person and possibly more appealing to her once again but I dont think it is working. I guess the low down dirty truth is that being with me isnt worth any kind of hassle or any kind of fight meaning that Love means nothing I guess. I have told her so many times that I would do whatever it takes to be with her and try to make it work because after all this time I still feel the same connection between us and I still get the same feeling when I look her in the eyes.

 Im suppose to go on a walk with her tomorrow after work and if that actually happens then that will make two good days in a row for me, which virtually never happens.

 In other news:

 My mom has been feeling well enough to attend class the last couple days, but whats sad is she isnt actually getting any better.

I honestly think that nothing I do will matter to her. Is this all a waste of energy and a set up to a huge let down, or what? 


 and im a little pissed because they sent her the wrong flowers and it was erik shafts girlfriend that took my order at village green, what a stupid, stupid girl.....

The time has come to work hard for what I want

 and for what I have always wanted

 and for the one thing that will make me happy with being me.

 Im ready to be open about certian things, here you go:

I havent smoked a cigarette in a long time. Pot is no longer an issue. Im on the right track

and yes it has been over a year since I have had sex with anyone. Which explains my crankiness I guess :)

Im really sick of some of my friends

I love my job and right now it doesnt bother me that it takes up most of my time.

The band is going through alot of changes. we are growing and thats all that needs to be said here.

Work was a real drag this morning. The fact that I have to be back there in less then 2 hours is also a pretty big drag.

 I miss not having to have a job.

 I miss being loved.

 I miss high school.

 I miss kasey (RIP).

 I miss Bethany.



 I miss me.

I havent been feeling like this lately. I had been doing okay. I got myself off the fucking energy pills (which is becomming a problem again). My job is starting to finally bug me. Im sick of the useless kids that work in the back and dont do shit. Might as well just send them home since we pay them to accomplish things that we end of doing at the end of the night anyway.

 We are finishing our new record one week from today at big bear. It will come out June 16th if everything goes right. Then we will be leaving straight to marquette the next morning and then from there straight to Florida.

 My mom keeps getting sicker and sicker. They dont know the causes of her seizures and they have been doing all kind of tests and cant find out what is wrong with her. My father and I have pretty much come to terms with the fact that we will never have a relationship. Thats fine.

 My car is pretty much dead. I have been walking to work and home pretty much every time I cant hitch with Mop. Its an hour and 45 minute walk at the least. Its alright though. I just walk alone down the side fo the street listening to sufjan looking at the sun. The days have been beautiful lately.

you are the rock. you are the rake. you are the one that I watch.
